name: Three Sheets to the Wind (Sebastian Parmentier)
name_original: Three Sheets to the Wind (Sebastian Parmentier)
description:
Three Sheets to the Wind is a pirate adventure! Embark on your journey as you shoot your way to riches! Upgrade your ship and gun, claim bounties and get that booty!

This game was created as a student project. This is my first ever game, and I only started to learn how to use Game Maker Studio 2 six months prior!
